prompt: In the heart of the vast prairie under the expansive sky, a vibrant ecosystem thrives with life. A herd of wild mustangs gallops across the undulating landscape, their powerful forms silhouetted against the backdrop of an approaching summer storm. The lead stallion, a striking chestnut with a mane like a cascade of fire, commands attention as it charges forward, radiating strength and agility. The ground beneath their hooves is a mosaic of wild grasses and blooming wildflowers, swaying and bending in the breeze created by their swift passage. Overhead, dark, swirling clouds gather, casting dramatic shadows over the scene while streaks of sunlight pierce through, spotlighting the horses in patches of amber glow. The dynamic composition captures the mustangs at the peak of their motion, their muscles taut and the dust rising in a golden cloud around them, reflecting the warm hues of the setting sun. From a low camera angle, the viewer is placed amongst the horses, emphasizing their speed and grace as they navigate the wide-open prairie with unparalleled freedom. The scene is painted in rich earth tones interspersed with vibrant splashes of color from the wildflowers, evoking an emotional resonance of wild beauty and primal energy. The image is captured in a cinematic widescreen format with high clarity and resolution, showcasing the details of the mustangs' coats and the intricate textures of the prairie grasses. The photograph carries a sense of timelessness, evocatively portraying the untamed spirit of the American West in a moment frozen in time, a homage to an ancient and enduring way of life.

description: A herd of wild mustangs gallops across a prairie landscape.
The lead stallion is a striking chestnut with a fiery mane.
Dark clouds gather overhead, signaling an approaching storm.
questions: Is there a herd of wild mustangs in the scene?
